title: Mercury sextile Mars
summary: Mental energy and action cooperate. Decisions can be made efficiently, and direct speech is easier without tipping into aggression. The opportunity is to aim quick thinking toward constructive tasks.

meaning.headline: Thought and drive support each other, enabling decisive communication.

frames.text: Mercury-Mars sextiles provide accessible focus for solving problems or initiating conversations.
Words can move faster today, making it easier to state intentions plainly.
Mental stamina improves when tasks have clear targets.
Debates can stay productive if aimed at action instead of ego.
Everyone will welcome bluntness or speed.

opportunities: Tackling tasks that need quick thinking
Using short sprints to clear clutter

do: Aim mental energy at one priority at a time.
Speak concisely and check for consent to move fast.
Use brief pauses to keep tone steady.
Document decisions so speed does not erase details.
Channel restlessness into movement or hands-on tasks.

reusable_lines.text: Quick thinking works best when it is aimed, not sprayed.
Direct words land better when they include consent to go fast.

forbidden_claims: Promises of victory or flawless decisions
Claims that bluntness will be rewarded
allowed_framing: Supportive framing: can energize clear thinking and action
Agency-forward language: you choose pacing and tone
Contextual framing: speed helps when aligned with clarity
